name: Sail Away (Walker Perkins, Fartlett, Horse_Holes, bigfatloadofgumdrops)
name_original: Sail Away (Walker Perkins, Fartlett, Horse_Holes, bigfatloadofgumdrops)
description:
S A I L  A W A Y

Come now, as we embark upon the Seven Chromatic Seas. We Sail by the guiding light of the sun. She maps the surest path to glory. We must sail by her coordinates, stay on the correct color path to survive the uncharted waters. Navigate to the suns coordinates quicker for more time on the water to sail further than any explorer has traversed before. 

------------

Sound on and elbows out for best results in this music and color matching game. Move the boats across the color spectrum using W/S for left boat and UP/DOWN for right boat. Line up the Left Boat to the color the left side of the sun displays, and the Right Boat with the color the right half of the sun displays. Match quicker for a combo streak that rewards a score multiplier and time bonus.
